roleset.name: to spread throughout
roleset.note: PERMEATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'permeate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from permeate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: This argument plays well in the atmosphere of gaming and mistrust permeating the Pentagon and Congress , and unfortunately , there is some truth to it .
